#import sys
#input = sys.stdin.readline

def main():
    N = int(input())
    candies = [list(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(2)]
    dp = [[0 for _ in range(N+1)] for _ in range(2)]
    for i in range(1, N+1):
        dp[0][i] = dp[0][i-1] + candies[0][i-1]
        dp[1][i] = dp[1][i-1] + candies[1][i-1]
    for i in range(1, N):
        dp[0][i+1] = max(dp[0][i+1], dp[1][i] + candies[0][i])
        dp[1][i+1] = max(dp[1][i+1], dp[0][i] + candies[1][i])
    print(max(dp[0][N], dp[1][N]))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    N = int(input())
    A1 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    A2 = list(map(int, input().split()))

    dp = [[0] * N for _ in range(2)]

    dp[0][0] = A1[0]
    dp[1][0] = A2[0]

    for i in range(1, N):
        dp[0][i] = dp[0][i - 1] + A1[i]
        dp[1][i] = max(dp[0][i - 1], dp[1][i - 1]) + A2[i]

    print(max(dp[0][N - 1], dp[1][N - 1]))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

n = int(input())
a1 = list(map(int, input().split()))
a2 = list(map(int, input().split()))

dp = [[0] * n for _ in range(2)]
dp[0][0] = a1[0]
dp[1][0] = a2[0]

for i in range(1, n):
    dp[0][i] = max(dp[0][i - 1], dp[1][i - 1]) + a1[i]
    dp[1][i] = max(dp[0][i - 1], dp[1][i - 1]) + a2[i]

print(max(dp[0][n - 1], dp[1][n - 1]))

n = int(input())
a_1 = list(map(int, input().split()))
a_2 = list(map(int, input().split()))

dp = [[0]*n for i in range(2)]
dp[0][0] = a_1[0]
dp[1][0] = a_2[0]

for i in range(1, n):
    dp[0][i] = max(dp[0][i-1], dp[1][i-1]) + a_1[i]
    dp[1][i] = max(dp[0][i-1], dp[1][i-1]) + a_2[i]

print(max(dp[0][n-1], dp[1][n-1]))
